name: banana quest (pancelor, Tally)
description:
> this itch page is out of date

the game on this itch page is the half-finished thing we submitted by the jam deadline. we're not allowed to update the submission until judging is over, but until then you can play the updated version here: https://pancelor.github.io/banana-quest/

I wish we'd heard about this jam a few days earlier! (We didn't find it until the day before it ended.)

(if you rate this game for the jam, be sure to rate the jam submission on this itch page, not the updated game on my site! )

> how to play:
  • arrow keys / ESDF: move
  • ctrl-r: restart
  • get to the exit stairs! beat 5 floors to win
> credits:
  • design: pance, cryss
  • code: pance
  • sprites: cryss, pance
  • splash screens: cryss
